title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Online Science Learning Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Core Knowledge of Secondary Science Curriculum and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners develop one or more online learning modules in science through collaborative design and integration of learning technologies.
Learners design and implement at least three formative assessments using digital tools.
Learners improve online learning materials at least twice through an iterative design process based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
